title: Unintentional ASMR   Noam Chomsky   NO INTERVIEWER     Interview Call In Excerpts   His Life & U S
description:
Excerpts of professor and political activist Noam Chomsky, from a 2003 CSPAN interview and call-in segment in which he discussed his life and views of the United States.  

He has a deep voice and speaks softly.

If you like his voice, you can also check out my other clips of Noam Chomsky:
Noam Chomsky 2 - https://youtu.be/C6TUDN1dpzY
Noam Chomsky 3 - https://youtu.be/R7QmJYz7E5M


Please LIKE and SUBSCRIBE for more content like this!
  

Original video: https://www.c-span.org/video/?176809-1/depth-noam-chomsky

Video is posted to Gumroad:
